00000000_00000000_00000000_11111111
00000000_00000000_00000000_11111111

00000000_00000000_11111111_00000000
00000000_00000000_11111111_00000000
00000000_00000000_11111111_00000000

00000000_11111111_00000000_00000000
00000000_11111111_00000000_00000000
00000000_11111111_00000000_00000000

00000000_11111111_11111111_11111111
00000000_11111111_11111111_11111111
00000000_11111111_11111111_11111111

1024 0's (0000) -> 512 0's
1024 1's (0001) -> 512 17's
1024 2's (0010) -> 512 34's
1024 3's (0011) -> 512 51's
